features.name: Authentication hook
features.description: Client-side auth utilities that manage Supabase sessions and a custom local 'operator' fallback session.

features.name: Auth page UI
features.description: Login form for operators that fetches roles via RPC and supports operator-local session fallback.

features.name: Supabase client
features.description: Central Supabase client used across the app for auth and RPC calls.

features.name: Protected routing and layout
features.description: Route protection wrapper and main app layout that gate routes based on auth state.

features.name: Common components
features.description: Header, Sidebar, Loading spinner and other UI components used by pages.

features.name: Pages
features.description: App pages (dashboard, campaigns, contacts, PM pages, admin, virtual desk, etc.).

features.name: Type definitions
features.description: Database types and shared TypeScript interfaces.

features.name: Supabase Edge Functions
features.description: Server-side functions and migrations located in the `supabase` folder (RPC functions used by the client).

features.name: Build & Tooling
features.description: Vite, ESLint, Tailwind configuration and npm scripts for dev/build/preview.
